agents.title: Security Agents
agents.description: AI agent configurations for security review tasks. These agents can be used with GitHub Copilot, Claude, OpenCode, and other AI coding assistants.

items.title: Security Reviewer
items.description: Comprehensive code security review agent for identifying vulnerabilities and recommending fixes

items.title: Dependency Auditor
items.description: Package vulnerability scanner focused on supply chain security and CVE detection

items.title: Secrets Scanner
items.description: Credential leak detection agent for identifying hardcoded secrets and API keys

items.title: API Security Reviewer
items.description: API endpoint security validation agent for REST and GraphQL APIs

items.title: AI Code Validator
items.description: Specialized agent for validating AI-generated code against security best practices

prompts.title: Security Prompts
prompts.description: Reusable prompts for security-focused code review and threat analysis. These prompts work with any AI coding assistant.

items.title: Secure Code Review
items.description: Comprehensive prompt for reviewing code for security vulnerabilities

items.title: Threat Model
items.description: Prompt for creating threat models and identifying attack vectors

items.title: Security Checklist Audit
items.description: Prompt for auditing code against OWASP security checklists

items.title: Dependency Security Check
items.description: Prompt for reviewing third-party dependencies for security issues

items.title: Input Validation Review
items.description: Prompt for validating input handling and sanitization practices
